projects.name: Los Angeles Traffic Prediction
projects.desc: Machine Learning based traffic prediction system
features: Traffic congestion level prediction using ML/DL
challenges: Acquiring and cleaning real-time traffic datasets relevant to the Los Angeles region.
Designing a model that balances accuracy and performance with time-series data.
Implementing proper feature engineering to improve prediction quality.
Deploying the trained model via Flask while keeping latency minimal.
Managing CORS and API throttling during client-server interaction.

projects.name: Real-Time Chat Application with WebSockets
challenges: Implementing WebSocket communication from scratch using Socket.io.
Ensuring messages are synced in real time across multiple users.
Managing different chat rooms and message persistence.
Handling user disconnection, reconnection, and presence status.
Deploying on a secure server and optimizing for concurrent users.
